#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	int n,m,k;
	cin>>n>>m>>k;
	int on[n];
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		int count = 0;
		for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
			char temp;
			cin>>temp;
			if(temp == '*'){
				count++;
			}
		}
		on[i] = count;
	}
	
	while(k--){
		sort(on,on+n);
		on[0] = m - on[0];
	}
	
	int sum = 0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		sum = sum + on[i];
	}
	
	cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
